instructions.text: Mixed conditionals talk about a past condition with a present result or vica versa.
Examples: 'If the weather was normal, it would be cold and snowy now.'
Click on the mixed conditional form in the sentence below.

questions.question: Which sentence is a mixed conditional?
options: If it rains, we will stay inside.
If I had known, I would have told you.
If I were rich, I would travel the world.
If she had studied, she would be successful now.
questions.correctAnswer: If she had studied, she would be successful now.
